messages.message:
Fyi - for anyone coming here these steps have changed to setup SA, roles, policies etc for your sandbox. Details in the sandbox setup doc. High level summary here -
1.  Create policies, PSP, and (cluster)roles `make create-policy-and-roles-sandbox-gc`
2. Create SA, (cluster)role-bindings `make create-sa-sandbox-gc`
3. Activate PSP admission controllers using `make activate-pod-security-policy-sandbox-gc`
